newsitem.title: TANZANIA: Tanzanian shilling strengthens on dollar.
newsitem.headline: Tanzanian shilling strengthens on dollar.

text.p: The Tanzanian shilling strengthened for a second straight day against the dollar on Thursday after two months of weakening, the central bank said.

The shilling traded at a commercial mean rate of 600.1380 against the dollar compared to Wednesday's 600.1875. Until Wednesday, the shilling had slowly weakened against the dollar since January 5 when it traded at a mean rate of 596.4453.
Against the pound, the shilling traded at a mean rate of 959.7722 on Thursday compared to Wednesday's 963.9042.
